name: Mars 7
description:
Description:

Collect 30 ghost modules as you explore a martian colony and its surroundings.

Tech Details:

This was a martian themed project created in Unreal Engine 4. All visual assets came from various sources such as Sketchfab, Gumroad, CGTrader, and the Unreal Marketplace, as well as other places. However, some textures and UV's have been externally modified to fit the scene.  This project took almost 3 months to develop with various revisions in size and scope.

I certainly hope you guys enjoy my project. Be sure to leave your feedback in the comments below. I also invite people to record and upload their playthroughs of the environment, as I enjoy watching them!
